attributes.name: elements
attributes.description: Stores an array of all elements using manager.

properties.name: elements
properties.description: Stores an array of all elements using manager.

attributes.name: auto
attributes.description:
Element is positioned from connected to disconnected?
Otherwise setPosition and unsetPosition must be called manually.

attributes.name: fit-to-visible-bounds
attributes.description: If true, no parts of the tooltip will ever be shown offscreen.

attributes.name: for
attributes.description:
The id of the element that the tooltip is anchored to. This element
must be a sibling of the tooltip. If this property is not set,
then the tooltip will be centered to the parent node containing it.

attributes.name: offset
attributes.description:
The spacing between the top of the tooltip and the element it is
anchored to.

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Positions the tooltip to the top, right, bottom, left of its content.

properties.name: auto
properties.description:
Element is positioned from connected to disconnected?
Otherwise setPosition and unsetPosition must be called manually.

properties.description: If true, no parts of the tooltip will ever be shown offscreen.

must be a sibling of the tooltip. If this property is not set,
then the tooltip will be centered to the parent node containing it.

properties.name: offset
properties.description:
The spacing between the top of the tooltip and the element it is
anchored to.

properties.name: position
properties.description: Positions the tooltip to the top, right, bottom, left of its content.
